animal_shelter.data.load_data(path)

Load the data and convert the column names.

Parameters

Returns

df – DataFrame with data

Return type

features module

Returns

with_features – DataFr ame with some column features added

Return type

animal_shelter.features.check_has_name(name)

Check if the animal is not called ‘unknown’. :param name: Animal name :type name: pandas.Series

Returns

result – Unknown or not.

Return type

pandas.Series

animal_shelter.features.check_is_dog(animal_type)

Check if the animal is a dog, otherwise return False. :param animal_type: Type of animal :type animal_type: pandas.Series

Returns

result – Dog or not

Return type

pandas.Series

hair_type – Hair type

Return type

animal_shelter.features.get_neutered(sex_upon_outcome)

Determine if an animal was intact or not. :param sex_upon_outcome: Sex and fixed state when coming in :type sex_upon_outcome: pandas.Series

Returns

sex – Intact, fixed or unknown

Return type

animal_shelter.features.get_sex(sex_upon_outcome)

sex – Sex when coming in
